radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple nodules within both lobes of the thyroid.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Growth of the thyroid mass continued, leading to total thyroidectomy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Clinically unsuspected thyroid nodule within the left lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Nodule was removed, diagnosed as follicular variant papillary thyroid carcinoma.

radiographic_examinations.date: Interval between PPB and thyroid diagnoses
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Specific findings not disclosed, but the total number of CT scans was nine, with an estimated radiation dose to the thyroid of 180 mGy.
